TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Peter_Aluma, title = Peter_Aluma, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Aluma} }

S.FORM: Peter Aluma sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1973 , ryax sa tay 23 nqu tay 4, Peter Aluma, squliq na p'unro.
